In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
That which was reckoned to the credit of Saʿdūn ibn al-Jumayʿ from the sale of the merchandise - two bales. What was reckoned to the credit of Saʿdūn ibn al-Jāmiʿ from the sale of the merchandise - two bales.
together with what was reckoned in rent, an eighth of which was owed to his partners - one bale, Together with what was reckoned in rent, an eighth of which was owed to his partners - one bale. unter Berücksichtigung der mit ihm bezüglich der Miete durchgeführten Abrechnung, und der Erlös (sc. der Ware) ist seinen Partnern zugegangen.
for Ibn Šarīk, For Ibn Sharik
for Yusuf ibn Zarqun. for Yūsuf ibn Zarqūn.
